mapper.select: SELECT hospital_name || ' ' || NVL(hospital_spot, '') AS name, hospital_cptrvn || ' ' || hospital_sigungu || ' ' || hospital_rdnmadr || ' ' || hospital_buld_no AS addr, hospital_type FROM HOSPITAL WHERE hospital_cptrvn || ' ' || hospital_sigungu || ' ' || hospital_rdnmadr || ' ' || hospital_buld_no LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{acmAddr}), '%') AND hospital_type IN ('대학병원', '종합병원', '내과', '소아과', '가정의학과')
SELECT plc_name || plc_type As name, plc_addr As addr FROM police_station WHERE plc_addr LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{acmAddr}), '%')
